name: Speech to Text
description: Enables the ability to convert spoken language into text.

name: Multiple Query Rewrites
description: Allows the AI to generate multiple variations of a query to improve search or information retrieval results.

name: Augmented Retrieval Generation
description: Enhances the AI's ability to retrieve and generate information using external knowledge sources.

features.name: Memory
features.description: Allows the AI to access and utilize short-term or long-term memory for context and information.

features.name: Obsidian
features.description: Integrates with an Obsidian vault to retrieve and utilize notes and knowledge stored within.

name: History Summarization
description: Enables the AI to summarize past interactions or conversation history.

name: Web Functionality
description: Provides access to various web-based functionalities.

features.name: News
features.description: Retrieves the latest news headlines and information.

features.name: Weather
features.description: Provides current weather information and forecasts.

features.name: World Time
features.description: Provides the current time for different locations around the world.

features.name: Web Search
features.description: Allows the AI to perform web searches using a doctor container for safety.

name: Structured Problem Solving
description: Enables a more deliberate problem-solving approach involving breaking down complex tasks and synthesizing solutions.

name: Other lists functionality
description: Provides integration for managing other types of lists.

name: Database Integration
description: Provides integration with various databases for managing information.

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Features related to managing tasks and lists.

features.name: Anime database
features.description: Integration with a database for managing anime information.

features.name: Movies database
features.description: Integration with a database for managing movie information.

features.name: Finance database
features.description: Integration with a database for managing financial information.

features.name: Contacts database
features.description: Integration with a database for managing contacts information.

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Features for managing projects and related information.
